Uses of Interface
eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.InputSplit

  • Packages that use InputSplit 
    Package Description
    eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs  
    eu.stratosphere.nephele.template  

    • Uses of InputSplit in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs

      Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs that implement InputSplit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileInputSplit
      A file input split provides information on a particular part of a file, possibly hosted on a distributed file system and replicated among several hosts.

    • Uses of InputSplit in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template

      Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template with type parameters of type InputSplit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractInputTask<T extends InputSplit>
      Abstract base class for tasks submitted as a part of a job input vertex.
      class  InputSplitIterator<T extends InputSplit>
      The input split iterator allows an AbstractInputTask to iterator over all input splits it is supposed to consume.
      Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template that implement InputSplit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GenericInputSplit
      A generic input split that has only a partition number.
      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template that return InputSplit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract T[] AbstractInputTask.computeInputSplits(int requestedMinNumber)
      This method computes the different splits of the input that can be processed in parallel.
      InputSplit InputSplitProvider.getNextInputSplit()
      Requests the next input split to be consumed by the calling AbstractInputTask.
